attributes.action: Drop the price of tuition fees to £6,192 for anyone doing online learning 20/21
attributes.additional_details: We are being conned out of our money, paying full price for a course we could’ve done online at open university costing over three grand less also resulting is less debt over all.
attributes.background: Drop the price of tuition fees for anyone who’s course is completely online like those studying at open university. As well as ensure that university linked tenancies arrange partial refunds for unnecessary move to tenancies

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
